technical_specs: The choice of the correct regulator is crucial for protecting and optimizing compressors.
Our TK series regulators share a common platform: an optical sensor without moving parts, an integrated solenoid valve for oil filling, and an alarm contact.
Il TK3+ è il nostro regolatore di livello olio fondamentale.
È un dispositivo 'installa e dimentica', progettato per svolgere un compito in modo estremamente affidabile: mantenere il corretto livello dell'olio e attivare un allarme in caso di problemi.
The TK4 represents the evolution of the TK3+, maintaining its reliability but adding revolutionary wireless connectivity.
With the TK4, you can personalize your settings and monitor performance in real-time, ensuring optimal system performance.
Monitoraggio Remoto: Permette a un sistema di controllo centralizzato (PLC, BMS o SCADA) di leggere in tempo reale lo stato del livello, lo stato della valvola, gli allarmi e altri dati diagnostici.
Controllo Centralizzato: È possibile gestire e registrare i dati operativi di più compressori da un'unica postazione remota.
Specifically designed for systems with CO2 transcritics where pressures are very high
Always choose a version with a pressure maximum of exercise superiour to the pressure maximum of your system

iconic_quotes: The choice of the correct regulator is crucial for protecting and optimizing compressors.
Our TK series regulators share a common platform: an optical sensor without moving parts, an integrated solenoid valve for oil filling, and an alarm contact.

qa_pairs.question: What pressure range does TK3+ 130bar support?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK3+ 130bar regulator supports a maximum pressure of 130bar. It is designed to work with CO2 refrigerants and has an accuracy of ±1% of the set point. The regulator also features MODBUS communication protocol for remote monitoring and control.

qa_pairs.question: How do I select between TK3+ and TK4?
qa_pairs.answer: The choice between TK3+ and TK4 regulators depends on the specific application requirements. TK3+ is suitable for applications with lower pressure ranges, while TK4 is designed for higher pressure applications. Both regulators share a common platform but differ in their solenoid valve design.

qa_pairs.question: What is the maximum temperature range of the TK3+ regulator?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK3+ regulator operates within a temperature range of -40°C to +125°C. This makes it suitable for use in various industrial applications, including compressors and refrigeration systems.

natural_questions: What is the maximum pressure for TK3+?
Which refrigerants are compatible with TK3+?
file_metadata.summary: The TK3+ regulator is a high-performance oil level controller designed for use in compressors and refrigeration systems. It features MODBUS communication protocol, an accuracy of ±1% of the set point, and operates within a temperature range of -40°C to +125°C.
